features: 【Support Your Back】- The ergonomic chair fits your spine, providing comfortable support as you sit or recline. The "Y" chair back can tilt at a 10°angle without being locked, making it much easier for you to lean or relax at any time. Besides, this feature may allow some users to have fun from rocking the chair especially when they feel tired. The mesh back is breathable to bring cool and relax.

【Ultimate Comfort with Soft Sponge Seat】- Experience superior comfort with Gabrylly ergonomic office chair. The soft sponge cushion, covered in breathable mesh, provides strong support for your hips and thighs, ensuring stability during long hours of use.
【Rolls Quietly】- The executive computer chair rolls smoothly and flexible, suitable for office working, free from disturbance. Gabrylly branch office chairs make you sit comfortable, work better.

【Compact Designed For Various Scenarios】- Chair size : 22.5x22x36-39.8 in(WxDxH) This swivel mid-back chair easily meets the needs of both adults and teens. Easy to adjust seat height to sit comfortable. The ergo desk chair with wheels is designed to save space, but also fit various needs : office, meeting room, studio,home, study, etc. Good choice for remote work and bulk purchase.

【Enhanced Comfort and Versatility】- This GABRYLLY office chair boasts a standout feature - adjustable armrests, expanding the seat width from 17.8'' to 20.3''. This thoughtful design accommodates various body types, ensuring a perfect fit for every user. With just 3 simple steps, you can customize the armrest space to your preference, providing optimal support for your elbows. Experience unparalleled comfort and adaptability with our innovative armrest system.

【Effortless Assembly】- Set up your GABRYLLY office chair in minutes, without the need for screws or tools. With just 5 easy steps, you'll have your comfortable desk chair ready to use. No prior experience required. For any inquiries, reach out to our responsive GABRYLLY TEAM for prompt assistance.
body.description: Quick installation - only 15 mins, NO screws Compared to other normal desk chair, one of the main features of this chair is that it can be quickly installed and removed without any screws/tools. Perfect for users who have no experience in furniture installation. Just 5 steps to assemble the wheels, chair base, gas cylinder, sponge cushion seat, backrest and armrests, and you'll have a new mesh desk chair in 15 minutes. No screws or tools 1 person can finish installation 15 minutes to assemble Suitable for adults or teens

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GABRYLLY MID-BACK HOME OFFICE DESK CHAIR The small desk chair is compact and adjustable, it's nice in appearance and has a snug back. A comfortable office desk chair for long hours.

Whether you work from home or in an office, you’ll want a comfortable desk chair to get you through the workday. Pros Backing fits the natural curve of your backCan tilt the chair back 10 degrees to rockArmrest space wide enough to accommodate different peopleMade of breathable and skin-friendly materialHas a sturdy five-point leg base for added stabilityEasy to install The swivel task chair has an adjustable height and adjustable feature to adjsut armrests' wide. Purchasing an ergo office chair with a wide height range to accommodate a variety of desk heights, it could ensure your computer monitor or laptop screen is at eye level. By the way, the small office chair with wheels make it a good choice for office, home, meeting room, studio or dormitory.

5 steps to install GABRYLLY Small Office Desk Chair Chair size : 22.5x22x36-39.8 in(WxDxH) Seat size : 20x18.5 in(WxD) Loading Capacity : up to 275 LBS Recommended user height range : 4'11''~5'9'' For any product issues, please contact our GABRYLLY TEAM directly. Quick installation - only 15 mins, NO screws Compared to other normal desk chair, one of the main features of this chair is that it can be quickly installed and removed without any screws/tools. Perfect for users who have no experience in furniture installation. Just 5 steps to assemble the wheels, chair base, gas cylinder, sponge cushion seat, backrest and armrests, and you'll have a new mesh desk chair in 15 minutes. No screws or tools 1 person can finish installation 15 minutes to assemble Suitable for adults or teens

Get A Wider Space Between Two Armrests For Comfort The special features of the ergonomic chair is the adjustment of the armrest space. Some people would prefer a wider space to make arms or elbows more comfortable, so you could adjust the small handle on the seat, then the armrest space will be increased from 17.8 in to 20.3 in.

Adjust The Seat Height Easily adjust the seat height from 17'' to 21''. The small office chair can be adapted to different user heights and different desks. Swivel 360° Comfortable Sponge Cushion Seat It's composed with the breathable mesh material and soft sponge cushion. The curvature of the seat fits your thighs, offering comfortable support. Rolls Smoothly The wheels roll smoothly , making the computer chair easy to move easily around at any time. Also, it allows the chair to slide quietly and protect the floor without noise.
Start a new journey with GABRYLLY office desk chair. More adjustment functions are waiting for you to discover and experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable Office Desk Chair
reviews.reviewText: The GABRYLLY Office Desk Chair has left a positive impression on me, earning a solid 5-star rating. The comfort level is outstanding, thanks to the soft sponge cushion covered in breathable mesh that provides robust support for both hips and thighs. This is particularly beneficial during extended periods of use, making it an excellent choice for long work hours. It has become an indispensable choice for my home office setup.Assembling the chair was a straightforward process, and the absence of the need for tools made it even better. With clear and easy-to-follow instructions, I had it set up in just 5 to 10 minutes. The hassle-free assembly is a significant advantage, especially for those who prefer to avoid the complexities of putting furniture together.The chair's design is considerate and accommodating to various body types, featuring an ergonomic structure that ensures optimal support for elbows, contributing to a comfortable and personalized experience. The adjustable armrests further enhance its appeal, allowing users to tailor the chair to their preferences.Impressively, the overall build quality is evident, showcasing a well-made chair with attention to detail in its construction. The smooth movement of the wheels adds to its mobility, making it a sturdy chair that instills confidence in its durability.In summary, this Office Desk Chair is a fantastic choice for anyone seeking comfort, easy assembly, and an ergonomic design. Whether it's for a home office, bedroom, study, or business conference room, this chair delivers on all fronts. I highly recommend it to anyone who prioritize both comfort and functionality in their office furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and stylish
reviews.reviewText: I have been needing a new office chair for a long time now. My husband told me to get a new one after he sat in the old offender. The new chair came in and it took him about 8 minutes to put together. No tools needed for him at least. The seat is nice and plush and cushiony. The material is soft and easily cleaned with a damp cloth. The back rest tilts back some when you are sitting in it and that is great. It is also easily wiped down with a damp cloth for cleaning. The levers to adjust the height level are within reach on the right hand side and not in the way if the functionality of the chair the way some are. Its tucked close by the stem of the chair which I think is good. My old chair the lever was just put there and I would hit it with my leg or foot sometimes and that irritated me. The spin test was 10 out of 10 lol. The gray color is very nice and soft. Very nice chair for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the most comfortable computer chair I've ever experienced!
reviews.reviewText: I love the way this chair was designed, and the fact that it's made durably and has cast Wheels that glide across the floor effortlessly. It was super easy to assemble. We were able to do so without even having to use instructions in about 10 minutes. Most of the parts actually snap together. This is by far the most comfortable computer chair I have ever experienced! It has a back that has a rocking or swivel motion and is also made for people with back trouble in order to relieve pain associated with sitting for long periods of time and back pain from office work altogether. It has an adjuster in the in the base so that you can adjust and customize the height to fit your preferences. The armrest on this chair are extremely comfortable and are wide. The seat of this chair is super comfortable and seems to be made for people of all sizes due to the fact that it's got plenty of hip area, wide armrest, and backrest adjustable. Definitely one of the nicest office chairs I've ever experienced!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but what's up with the arm rests?
reviews.reviewText: First off, this is the easiest chair to assemble that I have ever purchased. Second, it is lightweight and maneuvers easily with little effort.There are no tools required to assemble, everything just slots of clicks together with some throw levers for tension on the arm rests.Speaking of arm rests... what is the deal with their height? They can be adjusted in and out to accommodate different widths of users, but they can not be adjusted up and down so you are actually able to rest your arms. My arms are about 4 inches to high to be able to rest them. Or are the arm rests 4 inches too low?The wheels maneuver easily on carpet, hardwood, and a floor mat. The seat height can be adjusted via a lever and has a good amount of adjustment.The seat back is well vented and was very comfortable after 9 hours of sitting today.The seat itself is also very padded and comfortable.Overall, this is a great chair and would have been five stars if it had adjustable arm rests (up and down) to accommodate my arm height.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wife loves it
reviews.reviewText: Actually got this for my wife to use as a chair for her sewing room. Very easy to assemble. Very nice looks. VERY comfortable. Can use with or without arms, which is great option. Would definitely buy again and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Assembles amazingly easily
reviews.reviewText: This is our review of the GABRYLLY Office Desk Chair, Ergonomic Mesh Chair. Got this chair for my wife who has been using a dining room chair to work at her computer. As you can see, there are very few pieces to put together and everything snaps together. It literally went from the box to fully assembled in 7 minutes. One thing that cost us about a minute, when putting in the wheels don't try to just shove them in, they will resist you. Instead wiggle them as you apply pressure, and they pop right into place.The finished chair is solid and comfortable. It is easy to adjust the spacing of the armrests and height, and both setting lock securely.My wife is finding it much more comfortable than her old chair and her posture is better since she can set the height to match the computer table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and need a comfortable chair as I easily sit in it for 6 hours a day. This chair is very comfortable and wide enough for my size women’s 16/18 bottom. I like that it has armrests and they aren’t wobbly. My husband thought it was going to be difficult to put together, but he said he was pleasantly surprised that it was super easy. It took literally like a minute to put together. The gray is nice and it seems very sturdy.
